title: Upgrading Assistant Government Agents? Offices as Divisional Secretariats
decision_details:
- on a proposal made by Hon. W.D.J. Seneviratne, Minister of Public Administration and Home Affairs, Cabinet approval was granted to upgrade the under mentioned Assistant Government Agents' Offices as Divisional Secretariats.  This will provide better facilities to the people living in these areas and also for the expeditious implementation of development activities of the Government:

*	Jaffna District	-
	AGA's Offices - Delft, Kayts (North Island), Karainagar and Wadamarachchi East.

*	Kilinochchi District	-
	AGA's Offices  - Kandawalai, Karachchui, 	Pachchilaipally and Punakari
*	Mannar District	-
	AGA's Offices   - Madu and Manthai West

*	Vavuniya District	-
	AGA's Offices - Vavuniya North

*	Mullaithiu District	-
	AGA's Offices - Manthai East, Maritime Pattu, 	Pudukuduirrippu, Thunukkai and Oddusudan
